data.description:
Overview


 

Keysight is #1 in Electronic Design and Test products.  Through our almost 80-year history as Hewlett-Packard, and then Agilent Technologies, and now Keysight Technologies we have innovated through new business expansion.  Our customers now demand full solutions with broader offerings of software and services.  Typical applications which use our products are the design and test of Wireless 5G, Automotive Radar, Space and Satellite, and Internet Infrastructure.

 

The signal monitoring and Keysight spectrum management software (KSMS) team based in our headquarters (Santa Rosa, CA) is looking for a student who would like to gain exposure of digital signal processing (DSP) and direction finding (DF).  This intern will contribute from algorithm development, code development (Matlab and C++) and final system integration.   

You'll interface with many cross-functional partners from application engineering, product management and various R&D team, our team is across globe. this is an exciting opportunity for anyone who likes to be working in high tech industry.

 

You'll interface with many cross-functional partners from application engineering, product management and various R&D team, our team is across globe. this is an exciting opportunity for anyone who likes to be working in high tech industry.


Responsibilities


  • As part of front-end team of Keysight spectrum management software (KSMS)
  • Develop features to support upcoming software releases
  • Develop new functionalities to improve graph and mapping components

Qualifications


Desired Qualifications:

  • Junior, Senior, first year and master’s in computer science and computer engineering
  • Experience in frontend development using Angular or React framework
  • Have practical experience and knowledge of TCP/IP networking.
  • Excellent knowledge in Typescript or Javascript.
  • Experience in web deployment using On-prem Web Servers or Cloud Services (AWS)
  • Experience with web services such as REST
  • Strong instincts and background in creating simple, clean and easy-to-use user interfaces

Bonus skills:

    • Experience in using Plotly.js or other similar graphing libraries.  
    • Experience in Leaflet or other interactive map libraries.
    • Understanding of RF signals like LTE, 5G or WiFi or RADAR (class works or work experience)
    • Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
    • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Keysight Internship Program Requirements

 

Candidates who wish to be considered must be currently enrolled in an accredited college/university as of September 2026. Applicants who have graduated before September 2026 will not be considered unless they are starting a MS or PHD program after graduating.

 

Visa Sponsorship is not available for this position. Candidates who now or at any point in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H-1B Visa status) may not be considered.
 
California Pay Range: MIN $31.33 MAX $41.75 per hour
 
Based on experience, education and skills, most offers will be between the minimum and the midpoint of the Salary Range listed above.
 

 

Keysight Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.

 

Careers Privacy Statement***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***
